name: MFA Configuration Page Lockdown
description: Lockdown checkpoint for MFA Configuration Page (MFAConfigurationPageV8.tsx)
purpose: Stable reference point for the MFA configuration page implementation. This checkpoint preserves the state of the configuration page that includes:
features: Worker Token Settings (auto-renewal, silent API retrieval, show token at end)
Device Authentication Policy Settings (PingOne policy editor with dropdown selector)
OTP Settings (code length, auto-focus, auto-submit, validation timeout, resend delay)
Clear separation between Runtime Configuration and PingOne Policy settings
notes: This checkpoint was created after implementing pairingDisabled checks across all device registration flows
The page now properly honors all MFA policy settings including pairingDisabled, promptForNicknameOnPairing, skipUserLockVerification
Policy update now includes all required device type fields (email, totp, mobile, name, voice, sms) to satisfy PingOne validation
Runtime configuration (worker token settings) is clearly separated from PingOne policy settings
